results.title: The Last Airbender
results.overview: The story follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must put his childhood ways aside and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water, Earth and Air nations.

results.title: The Last Airbender: Origins of the Avatar
results.original_title: The Last Airbender: Origins of the Avatar
results.overview: Creators Michael DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko, who explain the backstory of their project and how martial arts informed the cartoon world and the eccentric characters.
